It's a major labor of love, you can tell that the devs are really passionate about the game. I'm really glad that the game is gaining traction again.

After this game has received updates it is heading in the right way. There are still bugs that can be game breaking (Ex. Kicking a gen and getting stuck in it until a survivor lets you hit them). My 2 biggest complaints as of now are how people are rated in the ranking system and how much money it takes to actually play this game. Each character has 3 perks which the only efficient way to get them is to just straight out buy them.





As of Summer 2020, this game is in great shape. KIllers are rewarded for "toxic plays," but are there really toxic plays if you are trying to win?
cada dia mais bugado !!!!!!!!!!!!
Kozak gierka do pogrania z ekipą <3

One of the better asymmetrical multiplayer games. Not entirely balanced but fun nonetheless. Play survivor first before trying killer and good luck in the killing fields!

Mini-Me and Dr. Evil are coming to the game!

Dead by daylight they are constantly updating and adding new chapters every three months or so. You have to grind a lot to earn certain perks and a bit of a learn curve for new players, need to learn each new perk for survivor and killer and what they do. Game is fun at times but you have a lot of the killers running the same meta perks, tunnel if they are new or camp hooks if they are losing the match. Best experience is to play this with a group of friends or find people online willing to play and/or team up for me personally makes the fun way better than solo queue. If your willing to buy check out some videos on YouTube or Twitch see if this game appeals to you. Some people may love it, hate or not enjoy it at all.

From this game, me and my pals developed a tactical strategy that we call "The Fortress". From this game i learned that when someone yells " EXECUTE ORDER 66!!" you just leave the game because you won't get a chance to play. From this game i learned that i should not get a phone with me on a swat mission. From this game game i learned that you can shoot your leg, get revived, and you will be back as a better person.

Ich habe Dead by Daylight im Steam Summer Sale gekauft, ich kann das Spiel unter bestimmten Voraussetzungen jedem Empfehlen der neue Leute kennen lernen möchte und mit diesen Zusammenspielen möchte. "Alleine" finde ich es schwer eine Runde zu überleben, da es Überlebende gibt die entweder nichts machen, sinnlos herumkriechen oder einfach nur trollen. Es ist nicht jede Runde so, aber ab und an mal hat man so eine Runde. Sollte der Killer (Face)Campen dann zieht man die Generatoren durch und "schenkt" dem Killer nicht noch mehr Punkte. So machen das meine Leute mit denen ich Spiele. Im Grunde genommen macht das Spiel, mit wenigen ausnahmen, Spaß.

Dieses Review spiegelt [u]MEINE[/u] eigene Meinung wieder.

Good game with nice little scares here and there. Makes most fun with friends and can be pretty sophisticated in a good way. It keeps you up with daily challenges which is a real lifesaver if you see no challenge in the game itself. But it still has a very toxic community. If you like teambased games with a little bit of dread. Then this is the right game for you

Extremely fun game

That being said it is definitely something you want to play with friends. Doing solo games gets boring pretty fast specially if you can tell other teammates are playing together and do not cooperate with you.

There is a lot of perks and killers that switch the game around as well as a variety of stages.

The game seems to lack in balance, certain killers and survivors have tools that make the game too unbalanced but you do not come across those matches too often.
Very fun and enjoyable game! You do need a decent PC to run it though
If you are going to main killer, remember to put steam profile commentary section friend only,trust me
